page.title: 10DANGER FROM LIMESTONE
page.content: In our area there are many limestone shafts which are very dangerous. The limestone has been quarried for hundreds of years for use in the metal industry. Some of the roads on top of the shafts have collapsed. Recently in Hill Road near the Foundry, there were some men who were drilling down to check the limestone. Sometimes the shafts are filled with waste materials and then have a cap put across the top of them. There are so many shafts in our area that have not been mapped properly that there is always a danger of further collapse taking place.
